All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ByteArraySpec
Provides a ValueSpec for byte array(byte[]).
ColumnConfig<T,R>
General interface used to configure value generator for a matched column.
ColumnMatcher
Defines the matcher for column metadata.
ColumnMeta
Metadata of a column.
ColumnMeta.Property
The properties used for auto-generating of a column.
ColumnSettingSteps
Aggregation of steps for column setting steps.
ColumnSettingSteps.CartesianProductSettingStep<T>
The step to configure Cartesian product for a column.
ColumnSettingSteps.ColumnFromStep<T>
The step to configure column from another table.
ColumnSettingSteps.ColumnSimpleStep<T>
The step to configure column.
ColumnSettingSteps.KeyOfIntSettingStep
The step used to limit the number of rows by bounding integral value for a column,
ColumnSettingSteps.ReferenceSettingStep<T>
The step to configure reference column.
ColumnSettingSteps.ReferenceSettingStep.CardinalityStep
The step to configure cardinality of reference.
DataGenContext<T>
Reflection information for named TableFacetsSource and DataGeneratorSource objects.
DataGenerator<T>
Defines the common operators for data generating.
DataGeneratorProvider<T>
Provides DataGenerator instances, this interface is usually used by JUnit extension or TestExecutionListener of SpringFramework.
DataGeneratorSource
Marks a method or a field as instant/provider of DataGenerator.
DataSetting
Defines the data generation setting.
DataSettingInfo
This interface defines the methods used by engine of data generating.
EnableFoxglove
Composite annotation to enable Foxglove test features.
FoxgloveJUnitExtension
JUnit extension for Foxglove.
FoxgloveTestListener
This listener resolving TableFacetsSource and DataGeneratorSource in Spring's Context framework of test first.
GenData
Annotation to define data generation configuration for a test method.
GenData.FallbackDataGeneratorProvider
Fallback provider of data generator, this provider will throw UnsupportedOperationException while being invoked.
GenDataInspector
A convenient interface to process objects defined by GenData.
GenDataObjectFactory
A factory interface to create data generator and table facets defined by GenData.
GenDataProcessor
Worker class for test framework integration.
Int4SequenceSupplier
Provides consequent number with customizable start and steps.
Int8SequenceSupplier
Provides consequent number with customizable start and steps.
JdbcDataGenerator
JDBC implementation of DataGenerator.
JdbcTableFacet
JDBC implementation of TableFacet.
JdbcTableFacet.Builder
Builds a JdbcTableFacet with table name.
LayeredDataGenContext<T>
Context class for layered data generations.
LayeredDataSetting
A proxy of DataSettingInfo for multi-layer settings.
ReflectGenDataObjectFactory
Uses reflection to create data generation objects defined by GenData.
RoundRobinValueSupplier<T>
Supplies values in round-robin manner from the given list.
RowIndexToValue<T>
This interface defines the action to convert a row index to a value.
RowIndexToValueSupplier<T>
This is a stateful Supplier, which need client code to implements Function.apply(T) method.
RuntimeJdbcException
Converts SQLException to unchecked exception.
SequenceSupplier<T>
Supplies consequent number with customizable start and steps.
SettingAware<T>
Interface for classes which support customized DataSetting.
SettingProvider
A type implements this interface is meant to provide DataSettingInfo possibly.
StatefulSupplier<T>
In order to prevent state pollution when cloning Suppliers, this interface marks the Supplier as stateful.
StreamOfTableFacetsProvider<T>
Stream alternative of TableFacetsProvider,
SupplierDecider<T>
Form a given context, decides the corresponding Supplier.
Suppliers
Provides utility methods for Supplier.
TableFacet
Defines the rules to generate rows of a table.
TableFacetProvider<T>
Convenient interface to provide a single TableFacet.
TableFacetsProvider<T>
Provides a list of TableFacets, this interface is usually used by JUnit extension or TestExecutionListener of SpringFramework.
TableFacetsSource
Marks a method or a filed as instant/provider of TableFacet.
TupleAccessor
Easy to be used for auto-casting on values of a tuple.
